promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a massive mythical chameleon water-type pokemon holding a ornate staff. It can be found in river-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, water or chameleon. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Aqumeleon, a a massive mythical chameleon water-type pokemon. It can be found in river-like environments It has the following abilities: Frosty Typhoon. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "chameleon", "water" or "Aqumeleon". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of water-type pokemon, chameleon-like, mythical, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, teal and blue ambient lighting
generatedDescription: This elusive river-dwelling titan possesses the power of Frosty Typhoon, turning nearby moisture into icy whirlwinds to mystify its foes.
